title: Online Simulation/VR Learning Design Workshop for University Faculty

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Experience in Online Course Management and Understanding of Fundamental Mathematics Education Concepts
context.additional_context: Competency development program supporting graduate professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to design VR-based mathematical simulation learning

learning_goals: Learners can apply a three-stage incremental design process to visualize mathematical concepts in VR environments within two weeks
Learners can improve user experience in simulation learning activities by over 20% through iterative prototyping
Learners can diagnose accessibility issues in BYOD environments and propose technical solutions within 72 hours
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
